Language_Pack.MiscStrings.word-chars-list-tip: This allows you to include additional character into current word characters while double clicking for selection or searching with "Match whole word only" option checked.
Language_Pack.MiscStrings.cloud-restart-warning: Please restart Notepad++ to take effect.
Language_Pack.MiscStrings.cloud-select-folder: Select a folder from/to where Notepad++ reads/writes its settings
Language_Pack.MiscStrings.shift-change-direction-tip: Use Shift+Enter to search in the opposite direction
Language_Pack.MiscStrings.find-status-top-reached: Find: Found the 1st occurrence from the bottom. The beginning of the document has been reached.
Language_Pack.MiscStrings.find-status-end-reached: Find: Found the 1st occurrence from the top. The end of the document has been reached.
Language_Pack.MiscStrings.find-status-replaceinfiles-1: Replace in Files: 1 occurrence was replaced
Language_Pack.MiscStrings.find-status-replaceinfiles-n: Replace in Files: $INT_REPLACE$ occurrences were replaced
Language_Pack.MiscStrings.find-status-replaceinfiles-r: Replace in Opened Files: The regular expression is malformed
Language_Pack.MiscStrings.find-status-replaceinopenedf: Replace in Opened Files: 1 occurrence was replaced
Replace in Opened Files: $INT_REPLACE$ occurrences were replaced
Language_Pack.MiscStrings.find-status-mark-re-malforme: Mark: The regular expression to search is malformed
Language_Pack.MiscStrings.find-status-count-re-malform: Count: The regular expression to search is malformed
Language_Pack.MiscStrings.find-status-replaceall-re-ma: Replace All: The regular expression is malformed
Language_Pack.MiscStrings.find-status-replaceall-reado: Replace All: Cannot replace text. The current document is read only
Language_Pack.MiscStrings.find-status-replace-end-reac: Replace: Replaced the 1st occurrence from the top. The end of document has been reached
Language_Pack.MiscStrings.find-status-replace-top-reac: Replace: Replaced the 1st occurrence from the bottom. The begin of document has been reached
Language_Pack.MiscStrings.find-status-replaced-next-fo: Replace: 1 occurrence was replaced. The next occurrence found
Language_Pack.MiscStrings.find-status-replaced-next-no: Replace: 1 occurrence was replaced. The next occurrence not found
Language_Pack.MiscStrings.find-status-replace-readonly: Replace: Cannot replace text. The current document is read only
